title: The Government's Top Secret Doomsday Plans Revealed in New Tell All
description: Garrett Graff, author of the new book "Raven Rock: The Story of the U.S. Government's Secret Plan to Save Itself While the Rest of Us Die" joins Chuck Todd on the latest edition of "1947."
